features.name: Prometheus-compatible metrics endpoint
features.description: Provides a stream of health and status metrics for the project, updated every minute. Can be ingested into custom monitoring and alerting infrastructure capable of scraping Prometheus-compatible endpoints.

features.name: Supabase Grafana Dashboard
features.description: A pre-configured Grafana dashboard that visualizes over 200 database performance and health metrics, offering an advanced view beyond the built-in Supabase dashboard reports.

features.name: Custom Monitoring Setup
features.description: Allows users to set up their own monitoring infrastructure using external tools. Requires a datastore (e.g., Prometheus) to store metrics and a dashboard (e.g., Grafana) for visualization. Supports both self-hosted and managed service options for these tools.

features.name: Alerting Capabilities
features.description: Users can configure custom alerts using Prometheus or Grafana. The `supabase-grafana` repository includes example alerts for configuration.
